answers.answer: Hopefully you start dilating, i got induced with my first girl and wasnt dilating fast enough after being in labor for 13 hours so i ended up having a c-section.
Why on earth are you being induced so early?
I was induced with my son as well & was in labor for 14hrs but I finally pushed him out so I figured it will be like That this time around& I'm being induced because I have gestational diabetes
I was induced with my son as well & was in labor for 14hrs but I finally pushed him out so I figured it will be like That this time around& I'm being induced because I have gestational diabetes
Aw well good luck! I hope you have a shorter labor this time (:

I am 37 weeks and my Dr plans on inducing me a few daya before my due date because of gestational diabetes. She let me know that if he didn't come by then that she will induce me but next week she said she is going to do a membrane sweep and check for dilation. She felt for him today and said he is head down but not engaged yet.
Yea  my Dr let me go to 40 weeks cuz I have my diabetes controlled with dietare you the same?

question: My due date is in two days & ill be induced on that day as well yay! But unfortunately I went to the Dr today & I'm not dilated at ALL :/I've been walking ,sex & even been drinking raspberry leaf tea I've lost my muscus plug a few days ago as well I Just know I'm in for a long labor but who knows as long as me & baby girl are healthy that's all that mattersI CAN'T WAIT TO HOLD HER!! <3
title: 2days till my due Date/induction!
